column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I decided to take a bath yesterday afternoon after working out .
#text=Once I got back home , I walked to my bathroom and first quickly scrubbed the bathroom tub by turning on the water and rinsing it clean with a rag .
#text=After I finished , I plugged the tub and began filling it with warm water set at about 98 degrees .
#text=While waiting for the tub to fill up , I undressed and closed the bathroom door .
#text=About 5 minutes later , the tub was filled up and I shut off the water .
#text=I briefly tested the water with my elbow and then stepped into the tub to lay down .
#text=For about 25 minutes , I lay in the tub and relaxed by closing my eyes .
#text=I had also took the time to read pages of a book I had brought with me .
#text=Once my body was totally relaxed , I took a quick shower to rinse myself off and then drained the tub .
#text=Next , I dried myself off with a towel and put my clothes back on .
#text=It was a great relaxing experience after exercising in the cold winter day .
